# One with Nature (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 149

*You cast the spell and are bathed in a golden-green light from above. As it fades, you feel in touch with your natural surroundings.*

You forge a strong link with nature that gives you greater insight into your environment. You gain a +2 competence bonus on [[Handle Animal (Skill)|Handle Animal]], [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]], [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] (v3.5 Hide, Move Silently, Search), [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]], and wild empathy checks.
